blackbeard:Sharpening.NAME: Sharpening
blackbeard:Sharpening.DESCRIPTION: Give all your equipped blackbeard:Weapons + !M! Attack.

blackbeard:RearmingStrike.NAME: Rearming Strike
blackbeard:RearmingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Equip a {A} / {D} blackbeard:Weapon.

blackbeard:Parrot.NAME: Parrot
blackbeard:Parrot.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, the last card played that turn is played again. NL (Does not stack.)
blackbeard:Parrot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, the last card played that turn is played again. NL (Does not stack.)

blackbeard:Halberd.NAME: Halberd
blackbeard:Halberd.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} blackbeard:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, apply 3 blackbeard:Bleed to a target per hit.

blackbeard:DrunkenSailor.NAME: Drunken Sailor
blackbeard:DrunkenSailor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, its effect is applied an additional time.

blackbeard:SwordDance.NAME: Sword Dance
blackbeard:SwordDance.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Attacks use all equipped blackbeard:Weapons.
blackbeard:SwordDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Attacks use all equipped blackbeard:Weapons.

blackbeard:GhostInTheRum.NAME: Ghost in the Rum
blackbeard:GhostInTheRum.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Lose !M! blackbeard:Resistance. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:GoldenStrike.NAME: Golden Strike
blackbeard:GoldenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.
blackbeard:GoldenStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! + 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.

blackbeard:PowderKeg.NAME: Powder Keg
blackbeard:PowderKeg.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / {D} blackbeard:Weapon. NL When it is destroyed, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:Scrap.NAME: Scrap
blackbeard:Scrap.DESCRIPTION: Destroy your rightmost blackbeard:Weapon to gain [E] [E].
blackbeard:Scrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Destroy your rightmost blackbeard:Weapon to gain [E] [E] [E].

blackbeard:RemoveScurvy.NAME: Remove Scurvy
blackbeard:RemoveScurvy.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:InfiniteBarrage.NAME: Infinite Barrage
blackbeard:InfiniteBarrage.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Cannonball into your hand.

blackbeard:SwordOfWisdom.NAME: Sword of Wisdom
blackbeard:SwordOfWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! blackbeard:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, draw 1 card.

blackbeard:SwordOfChaos.NAME: Sword of Chaos
blackbeard:SwordOfChaos.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! blackbeard:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.NAME: Golden Cannonball
blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 2% of Gold gained this run. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:GoldenCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL !M! + 2% of Gold gained this run. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:FinalBarrage.NAME: Final Barrage
blackbeard:FinalBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Cannonballs played this combat. NL (Every type of Cannonball counts.)

blackbeard:JollyRoger.NAME: Jolly Roger
blackbeard:JollyRoger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:CaptainsCabin.NAME: Captain's Cabin
blackbeard:CaptainsCabin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Cannonball into your hand.
blackbeard:CaptainsCabin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Cannonballs into your hand.

blackbeard:GoldenDefense.NAME: Golden Defense
blackbeard:GoldenDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to NL 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.
blackbeard:GoldenDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to NL !M! + 1.5% of Gold gained NL this run.

blackbeard:Toast.NAME: Toast
blackbeard:Toast.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! blackbeard:Resistance. NL At the start of your next turn, lose !M! blackbeard:Resistance. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:CatONineTails.NAME: Cat O' Nine Tails
blackbeard:CatONineTails.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} blackbeard:Weapon. NL After you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, give it +2 Attack.

blackbeard:Murder.NAME: Murder
blackbeard:Murder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage     NL to a non-Boss enemy. NL Fleeting.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have to target a #rnon-Boss enemy!

blackbeard:Bandana.NAME: Bandana
blackbeard:Bandana.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you hit an enemy, gain 5 Gold, NL up to a maximum of !M! Gold.

blackbeard:TacticalRetreat.NAME: Tactical Retreat
blackbeard:TacticalRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 more card next turn.

blackbeard:Dagger.NAME: Dagger
blackbeard:Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! blackbeard:Weapon. NL At the start of your turn, NL 1 Durability from Dagger is used to deal damage equal to its Attack to a random enemy.

blackbeard:PiratesWill.NAME: Pirate's Will
blackbeard:PiratesWill.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of your debuffs. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:Eyepatch.NAME: Eyepatch
blackbeard:Eyepatch.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
blackbeard:Eyepatch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Next turn, gain !M! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

blackbeard:BlindAttacks.NAME: Blind Attacks
blackbeard:BlindAttacks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times.

blackbeard:Boarding.NAME: Boarding
blackbeard:Boarding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Draw !M! cards.

blackbeard:AgileStrike.NAME: Agile Strike
blackbeard:AgileStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have equipped a blackbeard:Weapon this turn, reduce cost of this NL card to 0.

blackbeard:DangerousBlow.NAME: Dangerous Blow
blackbeard:DangerousBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your next turn, you take !M! damage.

blackbeard:VengefulSpirit.NAME: Vengeful Spirit
blackbeard:VengefulSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL The next time your Intangible wears off, you take !M! damage. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
blackbeard:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal 0 - !M! damage to ALL enemies, based on how many % of HP you are missing.

blackbeard:GoldenRain.NAME: Golden Rain
blackbeard:GoldenRain.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 2.5% of Gold gained NL this run to ALL enemies.
blackbeard:GoldenRain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 3% of Gold gained NL this run to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:Sword.NAME: Sword
blackbeard:Sword.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Swords. NL Equip a {A} / !M! blackbeard:Weapon with an additional effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #rFire: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yWisdom: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, draw #b1 card. NL #pChaos: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

blackbeard:BeatUp.NAME: Beat Up
blackbeard:BeatUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

blackbeard:ChaoticDefense.NAME: Chaotic Defense
blackbeard:ChaoticDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random card into your hand.
blackbeard:ChaoticDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random cards into your hand.

blackbeard:SmithingHammer.NAME: Smithing Hammer
blackbeard:SmithingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! blackbeard:Weapon. NL After you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon and passively at the start of your turn using 1 Durability, Upgrade a random card in your hand and a random card in your draw pile for the rest of combat.

blackbeard:WeaponMastery.NAME: Weapon Mastery
blackbeard:WeaponMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you equip a blackbeard:Weapon, draw !M! card.
blackbeard:WeaponMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you equip a blackbeard:Weapon, draw !M! cards.

blackbeard:Salvager.NAME: Salvager
blackbeard:Salvager.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a blackbeard:Weapon is destroyed, gain [E].
blackbeard:Salvager.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a blackbeard:Weapon is destroyed, gain [E] [E].

blackbeard:Anchor.NAME: Anchor
blackbeard:Anchor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:Anchor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:BoostMorale.NAME: Boost Morale
blackbeard:BoostMorale.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:BoostMorale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:DelayedPain.NAME: Delayed Pain
blackbeard:DelayedPain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your next turn, you take !M! damage.

blackbeard:ArmorUp.NAME: Armor Up
blackbeard:ArmorUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack with a blackbeard:Weapon, gain !M! Block.

blackbeard:Intoxication.NAME: Intoxication
blackbeard:Intoxication.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! blackbeard:Resistance. NL At the start of your turn, lose 1 blackbeard:Resistance.

blackbeard:CannonballSupply.NAME: Cannonball Supply
blackbeard:CannonballSupply.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add 3 *Cannonballs into your hand.
blackbeard:CannonballSupply.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add 3 *Cannonballs+ into your hand.

blackbeard:BountyHunter.NAME: Bounty Hunter
blackbeard:BountyHunter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:GoldenNoose.NAME: Golden Noose
blackbeard:GoldenNoose.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 4% of Gold gained this run.
blackbeard:GoldenNoose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to NL 5% of Gold gained this run.

blackbeard:DoubleBottom.NAME: Double Bottom
blackbeard:DoubleBottom.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

blackbeard:Provisioning.NAME: Provisioning
blackbeard:Provisioning.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion. NL Next turn, obtain a random potion. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:TerrorOfTheSeas.NAME: Terror of the Seas
blackbeard:TerrorOfTheSeas.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:DoubleCannonball.NAME: Double Cannonball
blackbeard:DoubleCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Cannonball into your hand. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:DoubleCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Cannonball+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

blackbeard:SwordOfFire.NAME: Sword of Fire
blackbeard:SwordOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Equip a {A} / !M! blackbeard:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:CloakAndCannonball.NAME: Cloak and Cannonball
blackbeard:CloakAndCannonball.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Cannonball into your hand.
blackbeard:CloakAndCannonball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Cannonball+ into your hand.

blackbeard:UndeadForm.NAME: Undead Form
blackbeard:UndeadForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Intangible. NL The next time your Intangible wears off, you take !M! damage.

blackbeard:WeaponProficiency.NAME: Weapon Proficiency
blackbeard:WeaponProficiency.DESCRIPTION: Your attacks use an additional blackbeard:Weapon.

blackbeard:FieryDefense.NAME: Fiery Defense
blackbeard:FieryDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
blackbeard:FieryDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies twice.

blackbeard:VampiricScepter.NAME: Vampiric Scepter
blackbeard:VampiricScepter.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} blackbeard:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, heal !blackbeard:M2! HP.

blackbeard:ReapersScythe.NAME: Reaper's Scythe
blackbeard:ReapersScythe.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / {D} blackbeard:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this blackbeard:Weapon, apply 1 blackbeard:Reaper's Mark to a target per hit.

blackbeard:PirateHook.NAME: Pirate Hook
blackbeard:PirateHook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals at least 10 damage, deal !D! damage again.

blackbeard:DeadlyArsenal.NAME: Deadly Arsenal
blackbeard:DeadlyArsenal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each unique blackbeard:Weapon you have currently equipped.

blackbeard:PowerHungry.NAME: Power-hungry
blackbeard:PowerHungry.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Power card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
blackbeard:PowerHungry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! Power card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
